Container.Name: SickRage
Container.Description: SickRage is a Video File Manager for TV Shows, It watches for new episodes of your favorite shows and when they are posted it does its magic. SickRage is currently in beta release stage. There may be severe bugs in it and at any given time it may not work at all.[br][br] [b][span style='color: #E80000;']Directions:[/span][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] : i this path, SickRage will stores it's configuration files.[br] [b]/downloads[/b] : this path is used retrieve the downloaded files by your downloader application (e.g. SABnzbd or NZBGet)[br] [b]/tv[/b] : set this path to where you wish SickRage move your TV episodes to.[br][br] [b]Tip:[/b] Set EDGE variable to '1' if you want to always run the last version.
